General.Name: Lojas Renner S.A
General.Description: Lojas Renner S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a fashion and lifestyle company in Brazil, Uruguay, and Argentina. The company operates in Retail and Financial Products segments. It engages in the trade of clothes and sports products, shoes, accessories, perfumery, domestic appliances, towels and linen, furniture, and decoration articles, as well as cosmetics. The company also engages in the granting of loans to individuals and legal entities, financing of purchases, and insurance, as well as provides personal loans. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Porto Alegre, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Joaquim Porto Villanova, 401, Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil, 91410-400

1.Name: Mr. Daniel Martins dos Santos
1.Title: Chief Financial & Admin. Officer and Investor Relations Officer
